title: [GAMEPLAY] Veigars E doesnt stun kata while she was ultying
body: I played a normal aram today with veigar. it happened 2 times that event of horzion didnt interrupt the enemy kata-ulti , i casted the border right in her but nothing happened she actually could shanpoo on me right after. like i said before this happened 2 times in this game.

replies.body: Also Pantheon and Amumu's stun doesn't affect her either.
I thought that was happening, but I wasnt sure...

And people wonder why Kat is hated. Half of the cc you would use to stop her ult doesn't even work. Ahri's charm doesnt work either. 

In fact, I had a game where she slowly moved towards me while ulting after I charmed her.
